rules_text:
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {G}.
flavor_text: [i]Users in the Buffer think nothing of spending a century designing a single coastline or creature.[/i]
notes:
!tag reprint
If common: Idyllic Buffer
The Buffer is a cozy town of hundreds of thousands of people surrounded by endless acres of carefully designed wilderness.

If KUT: Clearwater Grotto
